title: PaPa's Beans
markdown:
Nathan,

Please please please follow this recipe if you want beans.  It will never do you wrong and you won’t have the same experience I did the first time I made beans for you father and they turned out inedible. He is such a sweet man and he still asked for seconds.  I love you dearly.

Mom

* 1Lb Pinto Beans
* Couple Ham Hawks smoked, or 1Lb bacon
* 1tsp Pepper
* 1tsp Salt
* 1tsp Garlic Powder
* 1tsp Onion Powder
* 2cups Chicken Broth
* 4cups Water
* Soak Pinto beans over night for best results and shorter cooking time 2 hours
* If you don’t soak the beans the cooking time is between 4-6 hours
* Place all ingredients into a pot on the stove top on low
